meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The triple scoop ice cream cone was a big hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore a triple necklace with three different pendants.
meanings.sent3: The triple rainbow after the storm brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: His talent in juggling was like a triple threat on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The triple-layered cake looked too delicious to resist.

meanings.definition: Three times as much or as many
meanings.sent1: The triple amount of candies made the kids ecstatic.
meanings.sent2: He earned a triple salary for working extra hours.
meanings.sent3: The triple servings of dessert left everyone in a sugar coma.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a triple burst of joy.
meanings.sent5: The triple size of the pizza was perfect for the hungry group.

meanings.definition: To make three times as great or as many
meanings.sent1: She decided to triple the recipe to feed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to triple its production by next year.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally tripled the amount of salt in the soup, making it inedible.
meanings.sent4: The news of the promotion tripled his excitement for the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The marathon training will triple his endurance for the race.
